title.rendered: Gautam Gambhir poses with Sri Lanka flag after Asia Cup 2022 final

content.rendered:
Former India star cricketer Gautam Gambhir was seen to enjoy Sri Lanka’s victory over Pakistan by 23 runs in the Asia Cup 2022 final at Dubai Stadium on Sunday. After completing the match, Gambhir came out before the camera and posed with the Sri Lankan flag, and he celebrated Dashun Shanaka’s led team’s glorious victory.

            Gambhir also shared his picture with the Sri Lankan flag on Twitter, and wrote,

Superstar team…Truly deserving!! # Congrats SriLanka.

Gautam Gambhir

Read also:Fans will be really happy with Virat’s 71st century
